mean_en: an occurrence in which a group of people at a play, speech, sporting event, etc., show enthusiastic approval or appreciation by clapping their hands together over and over
word_etyma: ov叫喊 + ation表名词 → ovation 大声欢迎，鼓掌
sentence: The staff stand in a line and give the customers a warm ovation.
sentence_trans: 员工们站成一排热烈欢迎他们的顾客。
